Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to establishing a mollusk shell recycling tax credit
Summary: Establishes a mollusk shell recycling tax credit; directs DEC to promulgate necessary regulations.
LawCode: Amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L; amd §3-0301, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing a bivalve mollusk shell recycling tax credit
